english_measurements.address: 1st Floor, Belapur Bhavan, C.B.D., Navi Mumbai - 400 614
english_measurements.recipient_address: 7th Floor, Interface-7, New Link Road, Malad (W)
english_measurements.subject: Regarding payment of road excavation charges.
english_measurements.reference_2: Estimate submitted by the Executive Engineer, Turbhe, on 23/9/25.
english_measurements.paragraph_1: Regarding the above subject, it is informed that M/s. Bharti Airtel Limited has proposed excavation by the open trench method for a total of 812 m from South Central Road (near HP Petrol pump) to Manish Export in the Nerul division. In this regard, the Hon. Executive Engineer has submitted an estimate for the excavation of the asphalt road.
english_measurements.paragraph_2: As per the government decision from the General Administration Department and the estimate provided by the Executive Engineer, the amount of fees is shown below. Therefore, you are requested to deposit the following amount for the excavation work with the Municipal Corporation.

charges_summary.description: Rs 10/- per year per meter for 20 years, lump sum Rs 200/- per meter as ground rent

english_measurements.total_amount_in_words: One Crore Fifty-Eight Lakh Thirty-One Thousand Two Hundred Forty-One only
english_measurements.paragraph: As per the above, a demand draft (D.D.) for the total amount of Rs. 1,58,31,241/- (in words: Rupees One Crore Fifty-Eight Lakh Thirty-One Thousand Two Hundred Forty-One only), which includes Re-establishment charges of Rs. 1,23,86,436/-, Supervision charges of Rs. 18,57,965/-, Security deposit of Rs. 14,24,440/-, and Ground rent of Rs. 1,62,400/-, should be prepared and deposited in the accounts department of Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation. A photocopy of the said receipt should be submitted to this office. And further action will be taken to execute the agreement regarding the said excavation, please take note of this. In relation to the above amount, the responsibility for paying GST as per Notification No.03/2018 Central Tax (Rate) dated 25 January 2018 will be with your organization. Please take note of this.
english_measurements.surface: New Asphalt Surface / Cable through duct / Number of ducts 3 / New Asphalt Surface (Open Trench Method) / (Open Trench Method) / Total Sq.M. / Reinstatement Charges / Supervision Charges on A 15% / Security Deposit on A+B 10% / Rs 10/- per year per meter for 20 years one-time Rs 200/- per meter as ground rent / Total
